text: Ludvík Bohman (born 17 March 1973) is a former Czech sprinter. At the 1998 European Athletics Championships he was eliminated in the heats of the 100 metres and the 4 × 100 metres relay. His father is sprinter Luděk Bohman and his brother bobsledder Martin Bohman. == Personal bests == * 100 metres: 10.54 s, Jablonec nad Nisou, 29 August 1998 * 200 metres: 21.27 s, Ostrava, 23 May 1998 == External links == * == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male sprinters
title: Ludvík Bohman
